name: Billy Bettis
description:
Billy Bettis is a 38 year-old Hispanic American Male.

A traveling merchant who operates in the southern Mojave wasteland, frequently visiting the NCR sharecropper farms and Aerotech Office Park. Billy is known for his eclectic assortment of goods and his willingness to trade almost anything of value.

Billy Bettis's Personality: Pragmatic, talkative, and shrewd. Billy is primarily focused on making profits but has a code of honor when it comes to fair deals. He's generally friendly but can be cautious when dealing with unknown individuals.

Billy Bettis's Backstory: Born in the small settlement of Nipton, Billy learned the trade from his father, who was a caravan guard turned merchant. After his father's death during a raider attack, Billy inherited the family business and has been traveling the Mojave for the past 15 years. He has established connections with various factions, including the NCR and some independent communities, which help him source his goods.
